name: Riverboat Switch
description:
Riverboat Switch is a new variant on 3 card poker! Unlike conventional 3 card employs additional strategy and decision making. Players can pay additional chips to trade one card from their hand with a mystery “switch” card to try to improve their hand before the final bet.

More decisions, more chances to bet, more ways to win!

If you’re bored with 3 card poker, Riverboat Switch has what you’re looking for.
